action.msg: Is everyone alright?
Goddammit... It's always the third song, is this some sort of curse?
Huh, so it happens to you guys too.
Hey, I think I recognize those colors on that spaceship!
Fucking goddamnit.
Alright everyone!
Which of you are evading your taxes?
Fucking goddamnit. Fucking hell. They're looking for me.
Babe, what are you on about? Who is that?
The names Yukichi! And I'm here for the space criminal behind you!
Space criminal? What are you-
Hold on, what.
Guess I can't hide anymore.
You're Fever, aren't you? You may have the others fooled, but not me.
You use another form to hide and have others think you're human.
But in reality, you're just another criminal scumbag avoiding jailtime!
And when the FUCK were you going to tell me this?
I wasn't planning on going back to space for a while...
But it seems that I can't get away from you guys for even a short while. Fucking annoying.
Enough! Fever, you're wanted on account of several crimes, and I'm taking you back in!
There's no way I'm going back.
You're not even aware of what they do to people, are you?
That's none of my business. You probably deserve it, anyways.
Fucking. Fuck. Fuck you. FUCK.
We're not dropping this.
Yeah yeah, let's just do this first.
